Pre-Game Insights: Christopher Morel's Tampa Bay Rays face the Cleveland Guardians on Sept. 13 at 7:10 PM ET, and will see starter Tanner Bibee on the mound.
Morel has launched a team-best 21 homers and added 57 RBI.
Morel's home runs rank 49th in MLB and he ranks 100th in RBI in MLB.
In his career against Tanner Bibee, Morel is 0-for-3.
Last year against Tanner Bibee, Morel went 0-for-3 at the plate.
In 79 of 139 games this season (56.8%) Morel has recorded a hit, and in 19 of those contests (13.7%) he posted at least two.
He has hit a long ball in 20 games this season (139 opportunities, 14.4%), leaving the ballpark in 3.7% of his chances at the plate.
Morel has scored a run in 33.8% of his 139 games this season, with more than one run scored in 5.8% of them (eight).
He has tallied an RBI in 27.3% of his 139 games this year, with more than one RBI in 10.1% of those contests (14). He has also produced three or more runs in four contests.
Morel has been set down on strikes at least once 97 times this year in 139 games played (69.8%), including 46 multi-strikeout contests (33.1%).
Guardians starter Tanner Bibee has an 11-7 record with a 3.56 ERA and 166 strikeouts in 154 2/3 innings pitched.
Bibee's 3.56 ERA ranks 25th, 1.130 WHIP ranks 18th, and 9.7 K/9 ranks 12th among pitchers with enough innings to qualify.
This year, Bibee has notched nine quality starts.
